welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vandalia, a charming city in the heart of the United States! Known for its rich history and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at James Cox Dayton International Airport houses all airline check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves as the hub for domestic flights, with gates A1-A10.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves as the hub for international flights, with gates B1-B5.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dayton-Wright Brothers Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
